issue.title: sports.tv.rakuten.co.jp
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [NSFW] [https://sports.tv.rakuten.co.jp/pacificleague/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsports.tv.rakuten.co.jp%2Fpacificleague%2F) ### Comment > 楽天モバイル会員として、ライブ配信を視聴時にメッセージが表示されます。 > Adguardを無効化するとメッセージは表示されなくなります。その場合は野球の試合のイニングの合間に広告が配信されます。 ### [NSFW] Screenshots
Screenshot 1 [Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/uTJ6xNZ.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Mac v2.10.1.1277 release Browser: | Safari Stealth mode: | disabled DNS filtering: | server: `Google DNS`
Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

AdGuard Social Media

AdGuard Cookie Notices,
AdGuard Popups,
I don't care about cookies

issue.title: zinchanmanga.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [NSFW] [https://zinchanmanga.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fzinchanmanga.com%2F) ### Comment > Pop up ads show up all the time. issue.title: www.5yydstxt178.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.5yydstxt178.com/28/28443/718280_5.html](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.5yydstxt178.com%2F28%2F28443%2F718280_5.html) ### Comment > 你看我的两个图，有一个没开启Adguard，然后就有广告，而另一个开启Adguard后广告没有了，但是文字也没了，这算是错误拦截吧。我希望能够拦截广告同时不会拦截文字，毕竟我要看小说。对了，我用ublock时就不会把文字拦截，我之前尝试了一下 ### Screenshots

comment.body:
> Cann't open. Which filter causes it?无法打开。哪个过滤器导致它？

你们无法打开网站吗？你们可能需要用中国大陆的网络进入，进入时需要填1234，然后才能进入，我要打开网站也是需要输入1234才能进去的
